title: Beer Bottling Calculator | Priming Sugar, Bottles & Carbonation Volumes

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Residual CO₂ (volumes) from temperature (°F): V_{res}(T_F) = 3.0378 - 0.050062\,T_F + 0.00026555\,T_F^2 Required sugar mass (grams): m_{sugar} = (V_{target} - V_{res}) \times V_{beer,L} \times k_{sugar} Per-bottle sugar (grams): m_{per\_bot} = \dfrac{m_{sugar}}{N_{bottles}} \;\;\; \text{where} \;\; N_{bottles}=\left\lceil\dfrac{1000\,V_{beer,L}}{V_{bottle,mL}}\right\rceil
